ModMetaData.name: M-13's Safe Batteries and Conduits
ModMetaData.author: General M-13
ModMetaData.description:
=============== M-13's Safe Batteries and Conduits ===============
This is a mod about a safe batteries and conduits. This will provide you with 2 extra batteries (1 with glow, 1 without) that can be used in game. These batteries is a bit more expensive to place and will be less efficient, but stores more energy and nullifies electrical fires. (It's also insulated against rain ;)) This mod now also contains modded versions of the conduits, these do not explode!
Enjoy!
General M-13 https://www.twitch.tv/generalm13
=========================================================
